entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
